items.question: How fast do we go live?
items.answer: Within three working days after the intake we deliver a micro-automation. You experience impact without risking operations.

items.question: Does this work with our tools?
items.answer: Yes. We integrate with ERP, CRM, CAD, SQL and custom systems via API or RPA when needed.

items.question: How do you ensure GDPR compliance?
